title: (20140) Andoain - 19 Kale Nagusia Kalea
description: DO Laundry self-service laundry

title: (20140) Andoain - Txistoki Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Very quiet parking in town. Good access from the N1 and easy to park. Services of all kinds within walking distance (supermarket, greengrocer, butcher, cafeteria...) Perfect for spending a night, stocking cupboards and getting to know Andoain and the Leizaran natural park and its 25 km greenway by bike. You cannot park on Tuesday and Saturday mornings as there is a market.

title: (20140) Andoain - 15 Extremadura Kalea
description: Parking without services in the upper part of Andoain. Level. Very calm. Easy access. Close to the cycle route.

title: (20140) Andoain - 1 Sorabilla Auzoa
description:
Parking in the polygon,
access to the town in 5'.
No services.
Close to the highway, a bit noisy.
Little fuss on the weekend,
midweek things will change!!!!

title: (20140) Andoain - 2 Txitibar Plaza
description: Self-service laundry with washing machines and dryers. There is also a dog washing station. Open Monday to Sunday 8AM-22PM. Supermarket, bars and restaurants around.

title: (20140) Andoain - 53W Leizotz Auzoa
description: Parking giving access to the Leizaran valley. Ideal for mountain biking and fishing.

title: (20130) Urnieta - S/N Barrio Ergoyen
description: Shell gas station for trucks (and cars) with the possibility to take a shower

title: (20150) Villabona - 7C Agaraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Cepsa service station. Open 24 hours. Small Carrefour supermarket and clean toilets. Showers

title: (20130) Urnieta - 33B Barrio Ergoyen
description: Fantastic parking lot with stunning views. Although the track may seem narrow, it is still as it was at the beginning. it does not shrink at any time.

title: (20170) Donostia - 14 Abalotz Errepidea
description: Gas station with shower available, just ask for the key at the cash desk at the express junction.

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 8 Oria Etorbidea
description: No picture and it's really a shame. SUPER STOP BATHING so I recommend! Just go up the river via the small park, go under the 4 lanes and we land on a beautiful spot for swimming in the wilderness in 5 minutes walk from the car park. Not tested to spend the night but parking that seems quite discreet and protect from the road by a building.

title: (20130) Urnieta - 22 Errekalde Kalea
description:
it is a very quiet car park. To start the visit of Mount Adarra.
La última semana de septiembre y la primera de octubre is occupied by the ferias de las fiestas del pueblo.

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 81 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Galp gas station with showers

title: (20150) Villabona - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area "Komizar" with picnic tables and barbecues. Narrow paved road.

title: (20150) Villabona - 35X Lugar Barrio Otelarre
description: Esplanade of land next to the door of the Hika Winery. The winery is visited and they are very friendly. Space for more than 20 vehicles with no clearance limit.

title: (20150) Zizurkil - 17 Ernio Bidea
description: Quiet parking for the night and day. gravel parking, is level, has street lighting and garbage containers. shops, bars and square 100 meters

title: (20150) Villabona - Legarreta Auzoa
description: Beautiful, quiet park with shops and bars to visit, bike path and the train station nearby to visit San Sebastian.

title: (20159) - 909 Lugar Zizurkil Nucleo
description: Parking at the entrance of Zizurkil Arriba. Very quiet, next to a church and the road. Few noises at night, cars do not usually pass, except at rush hour when there is a bit more hustle and bustle. Have we ever seen motorhomes stay overnight as well. Good views.

title: (20120) Hernani - 5 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nook at the edge of a busy road. A wooden bench to enjoy the view. Sloping. No services. Close to the Santa Bárbara climbing spot. Noise from the highway but light at night depending on your insulation. Other nooks are accessible all along the road to the hermitage (chapel). Some a little flatter near the retaurant, for some less sheltered from the wind but with fewer trees hiding the view;)

title: (20170) Donostia - 6 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Large free parking with shade located 200 m from the town next to horse race track. Only busy on race days. Cycle path to cycle the 8km to San Sebastian beach but this town has plenty of shops and bars anyway.

title: (20160) Gipuzkoa - 13W Bidea Illarraltzueta
description: Parking at the back of the cemetery. Slight slope.

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 3 Hipodromo Etorbidea-Avda del Hipodromo Hiribidea
title_short: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 3 Hipodromo Etorbidea-Avda del Hipodromo Hiribidea
description: LavaXpres self service laundromat. Washing 30min small 4.5e big 8e. Drying 30min small 4.5e big 5.50e. Detergent and softener 0.5e each or bring your own. Open every day 8-22.

title: (20120) Hernani - 902 Kalea Antsorena Anaien
description:
Esplanade in this town that can fit motorhomes and campervan cars. It is dirt but it is level.
Close to San Sebastián and there is not much noise.
Put yourself on the side of the wall better than on the one with the trees since there are more bugs there.

title: (20120) Hernani - 2 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nice quiet parking lot directly below the Sankt Barbara chapel. The driveway is a bit steep but the view is nice (despite the industry). Sloping throughout the area, but possible without ramps with the help of the curb.

title: (20120) Hernani - 7B Antsorena Anaien Kalea
description: Parking with a field next door and you can spend the night there. recommended in cider production season.

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 923 Lugar Barrio Txikierdi
description: This free parking space for 4 caravans is located next to Urbil Shopping Centre in Usurbil. It's open from 9:30am to 24:00am.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 4 Errekaldea Kalea
description: Behind an industrial area along the river ... has very quiet shade. Perfect for a picnic pose I think we could spend the night there but not tempted ..

title: (20170) Usurbil - 906 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Shaded picnic area

title: (20170) Usurbil - 13 Urdaiaga Auzoa

title: (20170) Usurbil - 911 Paseo Gernika
description: Parking in the center of town, in front of the sports center. It has several places. We have spent the night without any problem. Next there is a dog camp. Source outside the sports center.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 38 Kalezar Auzoa

title: (20128) Ereñotzu - GI-3410
description: Parking on the side of the road, along a river. Pleasant, a bit of traffic.

description: Water fountain and 10 parking spaces

description: Self-service laundry. Hours Monday to Saturday from 8-22 hours. Sunday I am not clear.

description: It's not the greatest place in an industrial area but it's good enough for one night and quiet.

title: (20159) Asteasu - 7 Ibarrazpi Pasealekua Ibilbidea

title: (20270) Irura - 5 Zillar Kalea

title: (20159) - 910 Zilar Kalea

title: (20009) Donostia - 172 Oriamendi Pasealekua
description: Gravel parking next to the Ekogune park. Perfect to visit.

title: (20120) Hernani - 30 Ibaiondo Industrialdea

title_short: (20120) Hernani - Segundo Cinturon de San Sebastian Errepidea

address.street: Segundo Cinturon de San Sebastian Errepidea

title: (20120) Hernani - 6 Florida Auzoa
description: Parking in battery and later in parallel, we have slept without problem, sometimes the train is heard but they respect it at night. Dead end street, very long ACs still have a hard time if they can't find a place

title: (20128) Lugar - 55W Lugar Barrio Ereñotzu

On the hill, in addition to magnificent views, you can see the Sagastieta Dolmen (there are also others in the area). At the beginning of the path on the right, after about 200m you will reach the Akola picnic area, with several wooden tables, grills and a fountain.

title: (20009) Donostia - 53 De Mikeletegi Ibilbidea
description: Parking in the technology park with wide online car parks, ideal for visiting the science museum, we only spent the day, we did not spend the night.

description: Industrial estate, very quiet

name: Camping Igara

description: Small camping. the equipment is paid : pool, weight room, sauna and hammam (we have not tried). The pitches are small.

title: (20494) Alkiza - 15E Alkiza Plaza
description: Spacious and quiet parking next to the cemetery of the village of Alkiza. there are beautiful views of the valleys and Basque hamlets and Mount Ernio

title: (20014) Donostia - 910 Miramon Pasealekua
description: Plenty of parking along the street, more for campers. Large mobile homes were also spotted, but a little further towards the stadium, where they were parked parallel to the road. No prohibition signs, fairly quiet/little traffic at night. Park in the immediate vicinity.

title: (20018) Donostia - 61 Arturo Campion Kalea
description: Fallback of the place by the park is full. Yet, literally nothing around. Parking quite even, fully empty.

title: (20018) Donostia - 107 Illarra Bidea

title: (20018) San Sebastián -

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 31 Santio Zeharra Kalea
description: Magnificent parking that is accessed by tracks. It fits a large camper or ac without problem. Although there are slopes to climb do not be scared. It arrives without problem. Worth. I post some photos of the views that are 10 meters from the parking lot. They are the best views of the bay of San Sebastián.

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 904 Kale Nagusia

title: (20009) Donostia - 14 Hegaztien Pasealekua

title: (20018) Donostia - 11 Zarautz Kalea

title: (20018) Donostia - 28 Loistarain Kalea
description: Quiet dead end with green areas and quiet little houses. Few places but if you have the chance to find one, we spend a great night just a stone's throw from the bay with our electric bikes.

title: (20018) Donostia - 84 Illarra Bidea
description: Free parking spaces along the road where you can also park with a long camper. Far from the center, it is only good if you don't know where to go.

title: (20018) San Sebastián - Lugaritz Pasealekua
description: Free daytime parking ideal for visiting the beach with the possibility of spending the night only parking

Very quiet place and spectacular location
Along the way there are areas where you can park well

title: (20014) Donostia - 926 Miramon Pasealekua
description: Ample parking (although somewhat uneven at some points), ideal for leaving the motorhome to visit San Sebastián. It is the parking lot of the bullring/basketball stadium, not very crowded when there is no match. A short distance away you can take the 28 bus, which goes directly to the center. They come by regularly. Ideal place to visit the city since throughout the city there is a blue zone with limited hours of parking. No AC services.

title: (20810) - 18W Lugar Ortzaika Aldea
description: Parking on the right from St Sébastien between the wine cellar and a restaurant opposite the parking below, already mentioned

title: (20400) Tolosa - 13 Izaskungo Aldapa
description: Level ground parking in a very quiet place with very nice views towards the mountains of Tolosa

title: (20810) Orio - Lugar Ortzaika Aldea, 901
description: 10 dedicated motorhome spaces provided by council in small car park just of main road. No black or grey dump but steps down to River and a drinking water fountain. Very handy base to walk or cycle along pretty river path to Orio town or on further to beach.  2 night max stay. Restaurant and waste bins opposite.

name: wecamp San Sebastian
title: (20008) wecamp San Sebastian
description: wecamp San Sebastian, located about 300 meters above sea level. In part of the campsite there are mobile-homes and plots for campers and glamping tents. The plots are 60m2 where all types of caravans and motorhomes fit. Plus and Premium pitches include electricity.

title: (20008) Donostia - 69 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Annex to the campsite for motorhomes and campers. Ask at the We camp camping reception. It is not always open. Grassy area. Shims may be needed to elevate depending on the plot. Spaces a little fair for large motorhomes. Something cheaper than camping pitches. To take the public bus from the campsite stop, download the d-bus app and it will tell you the bus arrival time at the stop. Very practical.

title: (20018) Donostia - 72 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Parking space for paid city tour but plenty of space and camper, flat spot no service

title: (20014) Donostia - 27 Anoeta Pasalekua
description: Parking on the walk around the stadium. Quiet and shady place. There is a sign that says that on Sundays from 8 to 14 you can't park because they have a market. During the day you have to pay blue zone.

title: (20018) Donostia - 1 Manuel Lardizabal Ibilbidea
description: Excellent day and night paid parking when the parking area is full. Recommended by locals

title: (20010) San Sebastián -

title: (20014) Donostia - 4 Paseo de Anoeta
description: Quiet parking in front of the football stadium, little traffic during the week, free very good to spend the night

title: (20014) Donostia - 16 Anoeta Pasalekua

title: (20018) Donostia - 70 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Motorhome, Van and car parking in service road. No view but good access to San Sebastián.

description:
Along a small quiet road and the river.

description: Parking in the street in a green zone in a cozy neighborhood. Up to 9 hours of parking maximum. n zone (blue and green marking) Be careful not to park on resident sites (white marking). Less than 15min from the gardens of Alderdi Eder. Perfect for visiting the old town during the day.

title: (20008) Donostia - 6 Wiesbaden Kalea
description: Quiet parking in a residential area, it is located 3 minutes from the beach and the showers place.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 23B Lugar Barrio San Esteban
description: Municipal motorhome area near the center without shade.

title: (20009) Donostia - 3 San Roke Kalea
description: Central site in San Sebastian. We have slept here and everything is ok. Flat but the entrance is a bit narrow depending on the vehicle, it is very close to the center and has beautiful views. It is paid during the day but free from 8pm to 9am.

title: (20008) Donostia - 4 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description: Public baths / showers hot water. Located below the promenade. WC FACILITIES: 11 (1 disabled) Urinals: 4 Showers: 32 (hot water) 1 for disabled people Lockers: 214 (5 disabled) Rental of shower towels: Yes First aid kit: Yes. HOURS June-September: from 9: 00h. at 8:00 p.m. July-August: from 9:00 a.m. at 8:30 p.m. April-May-October: 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Rest of the year: 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

title: (20809) Aia - 12A Iruretaegia Auzoa Auzoa
description: Wonderful starting point for hiking and mountaineering. Lots of local walkers on weekends. Deafeningly quiet at night. Flat asphalt to stand on. Sun and shade.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 30 San Esteban Auzoa
description: Motorhome area just minutes from the historic center of the municipality. With a rich historical and cultural heritage, Tolosa is well known for its cuisine and typical local products. To find motorhome Aire pass the two carparks into industrial area. You will find services on left and parking on right.

title: (20008) Donostia - 2 Kristobal Balenziaga Kalea
description: Spot for van without amenities because impossible to park in Donostia San Sebastián. Direction Igeldo, parking near the Hotel Leku Eder Possibility to take a shady path to reach the beach approx 1.7 kms or bus

title: (20014) San Sebastián - Mad. Jauregiberri Ibilbidea
description: Small free parking near public transport and 30 minutes walk from the city center. There is also a larger parking lot right next to it under the highway bridge. Convenient to park for free and spend the day in town or on the beach, didn't spend the night there. No height limit but the places are quite narrow.

title: (20810) Laurgain - 19Y Vial Camino Laurgain
description:
Parking 4 places for the night. seen on the river, but close to a busy road. relatively quiet night (just a dog barking all night)
good for a stopover

title: (20810) Orio - 44 Abaromendi Kalea
description: Municipal parkplace with dedicated places for camping-cars. Good access to the beach, restaurant nearby.

title: (20014) Donostia - 7 Nemesio Etxaniz Kalea
description: Laundromat with large washers and dryers. Close to the marked parking lot and with bars, restaurants and supermarkets next door. Easy to park and have a drink while you wait. A 20 minute walk from the beach along the promenade next to the river.

title: (20100) Listorreta - 54 Aldura Gunea Aldea
description: Parking with picnic tables, and motorhome services. Four dedicated spots for Motorhomes PLUS additional space in large lot.

title: (20008) Donostia - 9 Eduardo Chillida Pasealekua
description: Street in front of the sea. Water available right in front of the beach and shower available on the beach (cold) or for a fee otherwise in toilet area.

title: (20014) San Sebastián - GI-20
description: Loiola car park - one of several park and ride areas in the city of San Sebastián, without height restrictions, below the motorway bridges. Recommended for overnight stays as a last resort, but recommended for parking the vehicle and visiting the city. Attention: after the driveway you have to go straight on and look for a parking space there, only the left half is free, the right half of the parking lot is exclusively for residents!

title: (20810) Orio - 39 Abaromendi Kalea
description: The parking space of the mobile home is payable. Paying to park under a road bridge, located at a roundabout, quite noisy. The view of the nearby marina and proximity to the beach make up for that, so overall ok. The services are free - many thanks to the municipality for that.

title: (20007) Donostia - 17 Kontxa Pasealekua
description: Public deposit, with showers and bathrooms. It is at beach level, under the stairs that go from the main street.

title: (20492) Berastegi - 1 Elizalde Auzoa
description: Parking next to the huge village church in centre of rural valley. Quiet place without services. PR marked walk around valley starts here, as well as another short walk. Completely flat. Some amenities in village.

title: (20810) Orio - 13 Estropalari Kalea
description: Parking under highway bridge a bit noisy but perfect for spending the night. From 8:00 p.m. free. Beautiful to visit the surroundings, parks for children.

title: (20810) Orio - 16 Baxoalde Kalea
description: Large public car park next to the estuary promenade, a playground and an Eroski. Spacious with many seats and several vans sleeping. We spent a quiet night from Saturday to Sunday. Public toilets on one side

title: (20015) Donostia - 68 Otxoki Pasealekua
description: Unrestricted quiet parking.

name: Orio Kanpina
title: (20810) Orio Kanpina
description:
Small campsite with swimming pool. Sea at 200 meters. Super equipped, very clean with all the comfort and necessary possible including mini-market and restaurant! acsi card accepted. friendly staff and near the village on foot 10 mins.

discount card is not accepted in july and august

title: (20400) Tolosa - 15C Iurramendi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Parking without services, not exclusive for motorhomes. Located in quiet neighborhood residential area near the Camino de Santiago. Few places, there are mostly cars

title: (31754) -
description: 25km south of San Sebastian, towards Goizueta, it is an area on the banks of the Rio Urumea. Calm night assured. Swimming for the more adventurous.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 910 Usabal Auzoa
description: Free parking Sports area Usabai. removed from the center of Tolosa, close to the N 1. noisy due to the passage of vehicles of the National

title: (20810) Orio - 6 Antilla Kalea
description: Park and stay overnight in quiet cul-de-sac. Only 100m to the sea and sandy beach. We were there during the Pentecost holidays. Almost empty beach. Cold shower on the beach. Toilets open on the beach in high season. Bar / coffee 50m on the beach. Free parking between 8pm and 8am. Otherwise parking fee - is checked regularly. Parking spaces are about car length. VW T4 with rear box is almost too long.

title: (20810) Orio - 913 Calle Antilla
description: Beach parking, blue zone but on an esplanade where it is quiet and two minutes walk from the beach there is a bar with a very good atmosphere. The cool cool. Next to a park of ducks and roosters. Of course, you can hear the rooster sing

title: (20017) Donostia - 902 Garbera Bidea
description: Parking at the back of a shopping center with a bus stop right next to it, which takes you to the center and to La Concha beach (line 33). Very quiet if you want to visit the city and not enter the center which is crazy, especially in August.

title: (20017) Donostia - 2806 Garbera Bidea
description: Back of the mall. There is some traffic in the early hours. You can park well.

title: (20810) Orio - 7 Diseminados S-2 Barreiatua
description: Showers and public toilets

title: (20809) -
description: Quiet site with picnic tables and a barbecue. Surrounded by nature.

title: (20400) Usabal - 109 Usabal Auzoa Auzoa
description: Industrial area parking, fairly supervised, a little noisy but a stone's throw from the San Ignacio workshop for caravans

title: (20809) -
description: Toilets closed. don't crap around the place it's really disgusting. small effort to buy a (foldable) spade and dig yourself a pit in the woods.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description: Large unpaved parking, isolated and quiet. A walk takes you to the marina and the lighthouse. Very nice and quaint. The beach is closed, it is not accessible .. glass box.

title: (20400) San Blas - 904 Iruña Hiribidea
description: Huge parking aside road, but not noisy,

title: (20017) Donostia - s/n Barrio Alza
description: Big shopping mall car park, accessible to all vehicle heights and well lit up at night. Fairly quiet at night but it gets pretty hectic very early in the morning. Very convenient bus connection (line 33) into town. Underground parking (with CCTV coverage) available as well for vehicles up to 2m height.

title: (20012) San Sebastián -
description: Free parking for a good night's sleep. It is next to the cemetery and in front of the Egia football field.

title: (20003) Donostia - 1 De la Brecha Enparantza
description: Parking near the center of San Sebastián. Can accommodate up to 2.20m in height. We were in autocamp xl van traffic with pop-up roof. This happened :)

title: (20100) Errenteria - San Marco Gunea Aldea
description: Little spot below the parking of San Marko castle, in case that one gets too crowded

title: (20003) San Sebastián - Pasealeku Berria 6
description: A lovely place to park during the day and night. make sure you pay at the parking meters as the parking wardens are very attentive with cctv in the car to read the number plates very busy if you can park its a lovely walk into the old town very quiet at night no hassle worth it stay (from now on thanks to the behavior of some who used it as a campsite, you can no longer park from 9:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. so you can only spend the day and at night you have to go to other declared areas city like Ilunbe or the University)

title: (20003) Donostia - 4 San Lorenzo Kalea
description: C / San Lorenzo 6. Laundry with 3 washers and 2 dryers. It has a change machine. Very clean and recommended.

title: (20015) Donostia - 77 De Mons Ibilbidea
description: Free residential parking area. In August we didn't find where to park to see the city and here there were several places.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: On a hill, but we managed to sleep very well for one night. Light traffic during the night.

title: (20012) Donostia - 54 Sibilia Kalea
description: Paid parking space within walking distance of the center (30min). Quiet neighborhood, near bakery and supermarket.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: Very nice parking lot for a break. Unfortunately with a height limit of 1.85 m. There is space for 1-2 larger cars in front of it. Lots of shaded picnic tables and playground. Also a good place to start hikes.

title: (20015) San Sebastián - 902 Paseo Otxoki
description: Ample place for all types of AC. Looking for a place to park in the area I found it.

title: (20003) Donostia - 5W Subida Castillo
description: Very pleasant but paying and rather expensive for 3 hours in April. nice to stop and eat.

title: (20003) Donostia - 8 Salamanca Pasealekua
description: Short parking of 1 hour and 30 minutes, expensive, without the possibility of extending the stop. Very close to the city center and the beach for a very short visit.

title: (20001) Donostia - s/n De Cataluña Plaza
description: Parking garage 2.20m high - so bullis can easily drive in - a bit expensive but monitored and perfect for exploring the city.

title: (20100) Errenteria - San Marko Gunea Aldea
description: Parking Fort San Marko. Places of the horizontal bottom, on sites in grass Nothing indicates that it is prohibited at night. By obvious to find because roads are closed to traffic: take GI 3671. It goes quite steep and it is not very wide. The fort is visited in summer and it's free beautiful view. A light background noise with the San Sebastian highway in the distance (far enough). Toilet (very clean) and wifi in the fort. Chestnut trees all around the fort :-)

title: (20003) Donostia - Pasealeku Berria
description: Incredible views. Plenty of space to park during the day, you can no longer stay overnight. No parking from 9:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m., residents only. Keep in mind that you can only park in the blue zone, from the lamppost that has a sign to the rear. The white zone is for residents and they are fined.

title: (20100) Errenteria - GI-3671
description: Roadside parking without height restriction. Didn't spend the night but saw many vans parked there.

title: (20002) Donostia - 2 General Artetxe Kalea
description: Speed Queen Laundromat Much cheaper than the one on the west side! 8:00 a.m. - 9:00 p.m. 9 kg for 5.50 20 kg for 10 EUR Dryer 4 EUR for 30 min

title: (20800) Zarautz - 901 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking of a football stadium. At the foot of the 4 lanes. A 30 minute walk to the beach of Zarautz (10 minutes by bike). Picnic area near the parking. The police let us parked for lack of a campsite (all full).

title: (20013) Donostia - 73 Ategorrieta Hiribidea
description: For small vans less than 5.40 m. long. It is a small area next to the N1 main road, just behind the kiosk and at the entrance to the Ortzadar Ikastetxea, close to homes and a 15-minute walk from Gros beach. Throughout the day it is difficult to find parking.

title: (20800) Zarautz - 630 Asti Auzoa
description: Parking under the AP-8 to one side of the football field. the only drawback is the noise from the cars passing over the bridge

title: (20013) San Sebastián - Zemoriya Kalea
description: Very quiet spot close to Zurriola Hondartza beach in the hip area of Gros. We slept really well. Mind you, during the day our van got opened and we got robbed. So make sure to take your belongings with you if you leave the car there during the day.

title: (20013) San Sebastián - 28 Calle Jose Miguel Barandiaran
title_short: (20013) San Sebastián - 28 Calle Jose Miguel Barandiaran
description:
Parking very well located in playa de Gros.
Parking of 3 hours maximum during the day.
Prohibited to park from 9 p.m. to 9 a.m. (Fine from 9 p.m.).
The beach toilets are very clean but only open at 9am.

title: (20015) Donostia - 283 Alcalde J. Elosegi Hiribidea
description: Parking of the football stadium "Cesar Benito". Free, ideal for a day visit (not sleeping) of the old town (about 15 minutes by bike)

title: (20800) Zarautz - 3 Talaimendi Auzoa
description: On the Mirador de Zarautz, on the edge of the road behind the garbage containers, place for at least 5 vans or cars with a view of the sea,
